Heart Disease and Diabetes Prediction

About Our Prediction System

Our application provides a user-friendly platform for predicting the risk of heart disease and diabetes based on key health indicators. Using advanced machine learning models, it offers accurate and personalized risk assessments to help you take proactive steps in managing your health.

How It Works

  • Data Input: Enter your health metrics such as age, blood pressure, cholesterol levels, and other relevant information.
  • Prediction: Our models analyze your data and predict the likelihood of heart disease or diabetes, providing instant results.
  • Personalized Insights: Get tailored advice on lifestyle changes and follow-up actions based on your risk level.

Why Use This Application?

  • Early Detection: Identify potential health risks early and take preventive measures.
  • Accessible and Easy to Use: A simple interface designed for everyone, making it easy to understand your health risks.
  • Accurate Predictions: Leverage state-of-the-art machine learning models for reliable results.
); } } export default Home;
